Name: Commander Whiskertron
Description: Hailing from the pixelated front lines of the WebtrES club, Commander Whiskertron is a valiant soldier box known for his strategic prowess and feline intuition. With his classic button interface, he commands his digital troops with precision and ease. His sturdy arms and legs, forged on the virtual battlefield, are always at the ready to deploy tactical maneuvers. But don't be fooled by his robust exterior; Commander Whiskertron's screen displays the innocent face of a cat, a nod to his soft spot for all creatures great and small. Despite being a hardened warrior, he is a beloved leader who values the camaraderie of his squad and the peaceful moments they share when the cyber dust settles.
